title: v.248 Hotfixes - February 7, 2024
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.248 Strawberry Farm Festival update.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Channel Maintenance - February 6, 2024
content: [Updated Feb 6 at 10:13 PM PST] The unscheduled channel maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: Cash Shop Update for February 7
content: Gachapon Update, Royal Styles, Choice Styles, and more!

title: [Updated 2/7] v.248 - Strawberry Farm Festival Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.248 - Strawberry Farm Festival.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - February 7, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Luna and EU Burning World Channel Maintenance - January 31, 2024
content: The unscheduled maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.
